Segment.name: TI
Segment.comment: To identify origin and destination carriers, equipment carrying shipment, date shipped, seal status, and equipment type

Field.name: EquipmentInitial
Field.comment: Prefix or alphabetic part of an equipment unit's identifying number

Field.name: EquipmentNumber
Field.comment: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: SealStatusCode
Field.comment: Code indicating condition of door seal upon arrival

Field.name: CarTypeCode
Field.comment: Code specifying type of rail car or intermodal equipment type and its general characteristics
